columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: Date and time when the record was generated or updated

columns.name: BehaviorId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the behavior

columns.name: ActionType
columns.description: Type of behavior. Refer to the catalog of behaviors detected by Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management.

columns.name: StartTime
columns.description: Date and time of the first activity related to the behavior

columns.name: EndTime
columns.description: Date and time of the last activity related to the behavior

columns.name: AttackTechniques
columns.description: MITRE ATT&CK techniques associated with the activity that triggered the behavior. Refer to subtechniques in the insider risk management behavior catalog.

columns.name: Categories
columns.description: Type of threat indicator or breach activity identified by the behavior

columns.name: ActionCategory
columns.description: Category of action that triggered the event

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Description of the behavior

columns.name: ServiceSource
columns.description: Product or service that identified the behavior

columns.name: DetectionSource
columns.description: Detection technology or sensor that identified the notable component or activity

columns.name: ActivityCount
columns.description: Total user activity events recorded under this behavior

columns.name: IsAnomalous
columns.description: Indicates if this behavior is anomalous (1) or not (0)

columns.name: IsContentHidden
columns.description: Indicates if the behavior involves hidden content on a device

columns.name: AccountUpn
columns.description: User principal name (UPN) of the account

columns.name: AccountEmail
columns.description: Email address of the account

columns.name: Application
columns.description: Application that performed the recorded action

columns.name: DeviceInfo
columns.description: List of device information for the device involved in this behavior, including device ID, device name, and the number of events in which the device is involved; in JSON array format

columns.name: SensitivityLabelInfo
columns.description: List of sensitivity labels assigned to content involved in this behavior, including the unique identifier for the Microsoft Information Protection sensitivity label assigned to the related content, the name of the sensitivity label, and the number of events in the behavior involving this label; in JSON array format

columns.name: SensitiveInfoTypesInfo
columns.description: List of sensitive info types detected in the content involved in this behavior, including the unique identifier for the sensitive info type, the name of the sensitive info type, and the number of events in the behavior involving this sensitive info type; in JSON array format

columns.name: UrlDomainInfo
columns.description: List of websites or service URLs involved in the behavior, including the name of the URL domain, the direction of data (sent or received from domain), type of URL domain (customer-configured or based on watchlists), and the number of events in the behavior involving the specific domain; in JSON array format

columns.name: SharepointSiteInfo
columns.description: List of SharePoint sites involved in this behavior, including the unique identifier for the SharePoint site, the name of the SharePoint site, and the number of events in the behavior involving the SharePoint site; in JSON array format

columns.name: RecipientEmailInfo
columns.description: List of information about the recipient involved in the behavior, including the email address of the recipient and the number of events in the behavior involving the recipient; in JSON array format

columns.name: RemovableMediaInfo
columns.description: List of any removable media involved in the behavior, including the serial number of the removable media device, the manufacturer of the removable media device, and the model of the removable device; in JSON array format

columns.name: PrinterName
columns.description: List of printers involved in the behavior; in array format

columns.name: PriorityContentMatchInfo
columns.description: List of priority content matches identified within this behavior and their associated details. Priority content definitions are done by the admins for each Insider risk management policy. Displayed in JSON array format.
